responsibilities: Assist in developing Power BI dashboards, reports, and data visualizations to meet client requirements.
Collaborate with team members to connect, transform, and model data from Dataverse and other data sources.
Learn and apply best practices for Power BI development, including performance optimization and user-friendly design.
Support testing, debugging, and maintenance of Power BI solutions.
Participate in meetings with clients to gather requirements and present progress.
Document development processes and solutions to ensure knowledge sharing and maintainability.
skills: Basic knowledge of Microsoft Power BI, including building reports and dashboards.
Familiarity with data models, relationships, and Dataverse.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Exposure to Power Platform tools like Power Apps or Power Automate.
Basic understanding of SQL for querying and manipulating data.
analysis: The job responsibilities and skills focus primarily on developing and maintaining Power BI dashboards, reports, and data visualizations. The tasks involve working with data models, connecting and transforming data from various sources, and using Power Platform tools like Power Apps or Power Automate. The skills required include knowledge of Microsoft Power BI, SQL, and data modeling, along with strong analytical and communication skills. There is no mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is on data visualization and business intelligence tools rather than AI or language model technologies.
